topics.body:
You know; I thought of something: I often see people on here upset that their job sucks, or that they can't get a job or that they don't think they're successful here's something to make yourself feel better.

There is a outright industry dedicated for businesses, political groups and all sorts of industries dedicated to bumping up online reviews and defending the company and saying nice things about the company.

If you feel bad about your job at least you're not a professional kissass who has a fulltime job of being kissing your bosses's ass (metaphorically of course) for decades that the second you say something not nice about the company your ass is fired.  Imagine spending your working career constantly telling your boss "You look really handsome today" or going online and going to reviews and telling people how it's "not fair" that people online say bad things about the company.

If you hate your job at least you're not a professional metaphorical asskisser who has to *constantly* compliment their boss 40 hours a week for years.
